players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I believe we should focus on identifying the culprit behind Charlie's death. Let's work together to gather information and make an informed decision."

Bob: "Let's not jump to conclusions. We need solid evidence to determine who could have possibly committed this crime. I suggest we all share any information we may have, no matter how insignificant it might seem."
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso, we have to lynch him."
